meanings.definition: Clothing worn for relaxing at home.
meanings.sent1: I love wearing my loungewear on lazy Sundays.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new set of loungewear for cozy evenings.
meanings.sent3: His bright pink loungewear always makes us smile.
meanings.sent4: In her soft loungewear, she felt like a queen in her castle.
meanings.sent5: The loungewear was so comfy, it felt like a warm hug.

meanings.definition: A comfortable outfit for lounging around the house.
meanings.sent1: My loungewear consists of oversized shirts and sweatpants.
meanings.sent2: During winter, I prefer thick loungewear to keep me warm.
meanings.sent3: His loungewear was so baggy; he looked like a walking pillow.
meanings.sent4: Wrapped in her loungewear, she felt like a cloud floating at home.
meanings.sent5: The loungewear was like a soft cocoon, shielding her from the world.
